ygData.subject: Re: tinkering
ygData.msgSnippet: Not that I know of, the rumour is that there is another book in Solusek s Eye A for sale, something outrageous like 3000 plats.  You might can kill the gnome
ygData.messageBody:
Not that I know of, the rumour is that there is another book in Solusek's
Eye A for sale, something outrageous like 3000 plats. You might can kill
the gnome for it. I've heard that things in Lavastorm drop compasses, which
adds some value to the story of the gnomes in Solusek's Eye A.

Has anyone tried to use tinkered cams recently, I keep petitioning about it
but the only answers I get come from Apprentice Guides who don't really
know. They want me to try to make them and let them know if it works. Gee,
I'll jump right up and spend the 14 pp to try.

The best site i've found so far for tinkering information is:
http://www.eqportal.com/Tinkering

Let me know if there is a better one.
